settings.title: PROVIDING EXCELLENCE AROUND EVERY CORNER
settings.info: What is better than relaxing while someone else takes care of your details for you? With our concierge system, there is no need for you to hassle over different details as we will do that all for you. So, sit back and relax and let us do the work for you so you do not have to. We are more than glad to assist you in any travel or accommodation needs and letting you know where the best attractions around Chicago are located.

settings.subtitle: OUR CONCIERGE WILL HELP YOU OUT IN HANDLING THE MANY DETAILS OF YOUR STAY INCLUDING:
settings.info:
• Golf reservations
  • Airport accommodation and reservations
  • Taxi or Limo transportation
  • Local shopping recommendations
  • Local hotel recommendations
  • Local restaurant recommendations based on what type of cuisine you are craving

settings.title: SCHEDULE YOUR CONSULTATION
settings.info: Call Dr. Yates, the premier hair loss doctor, today and schedule an appointment. You are in excellent hands when you are with Dr. Yates. From our office located at 213 N Stetson Ave Chicago, IL 60601, we provide the best service that simply cannot be beat.

settings.title: GET THE HAIR YOU WANT TODAY
settings.add_text: Ready to love your hair? Call 312.883.9617 for a consultation or fill out the form below
